name: FederationOfHumanity
short_description:
Inspired by Habitat for Humanity, Federation of Humanity was designed to bring the same core idea (people working together and donating time to get time in return) to entire communities and not just home building by networking together the worksharing across entire communities and nonprofits.

Although the project didn't get support (non-profits contacted were wary of an untested project, and all wanted to wait till other non-profits tried it, leaving it in a catch 22), the core concept is sound. 

The code here was a labor of love, and is released as-is, under the GNU GPL v.2 under the hopes that the torch will be picked up and continued.
summary: Code for a Community Workshare Program
